Constructor Detail

BoardView

public BoardView(BoardModel model,
                 Image tiles)

Creates a new instance of BoardView

The tiles parameter is an image which is used to build TiledLayer instances which are used for rendering the BoardModel. The image must contain eight differnet square cells, each of which is used to colour one tetrad type.

The width & height of a cell is defined by the height of the tiles Image. Therefore, the width and height (in pixels) of the full board is defined to be the height of tiles x num cells high and the width is defined to be tiles x num cells wide.

Parameters:
model - The model that will be rendered
tiles - An image containing the tiles
